assignments.description: Assign values for new Appointment Dependence records
assignments.name: Assign_Appointment_Dependency
assignments.label: Assign Appointment Dependency

assignments.name: Set_the_Main_Service_Appointment_Id
assignments.label: Set the Main Service Appointment Id

constants.description: Id of the service territory to be used if none found/selected
constants.name: conDefaultServiceTerritory

decisions.description: Checks to see if the current Service Appointment has the same work type as the Work Order Template (main) work type. This will be the record that is used for scheduling later. NOTE: The flow assumes there is only ONE value of the (main) Work Type associated with the Work Order Template. If there is more than one record with the same value, will need to add more logic to capture only the first one.
decisions.name: Service_Appt_Work_Type_Template_Work_Type
decisions.label: Service Appt Work Type = Template Work Type

dynamicChoiceSets.description: returns the most recent 10 case records
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Case_Choice

formulas.description: Product to be Received By - based on the Main Appointment Start Date
formulas.name: forProdReceivedByDate

formulas.description: checks to see if {!varSelectedServiceTerritoryId} is blank. If it is, defaults to default territory
formulas.name: forServiceTerritory

Flow.interviewLabel: MRay-Account FS Schedule from Work Order Template {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: MRay-Account FS Schedule from Work Order Template

loops.description: Loop through the Service Appointment records, look up dependencies from Work Order Template and assign for new Appointment Dependency records
loops.name: Loop_Serv_Appt
loops.label: Loop Serv Appt

loops.description: Loop newly created Work Order Line Items to get the associated Service Appointment to use to create the Service Dependency later
loops.name: Loop_WO_LIne_Item
loops.label: Loop WO LIne Item

recordDeletes.description: Delete the Service Appointment created by the Work Order -- All of the service appointments are driven by the work order line items and the dependencies
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Service_Appt_created_by_WO
recordDeletes.label: Delete Service Appt created by WO

recordLookups.description: Get Main Appointment Fields - start date used for Product Request
recordLookups.name: Get_Main_Appointment
recordLookups.label: Get Main Appointment

recordLookups.description: Get the service appointment associated with the work order line items that has dependency 2nd value
recordLookups.name: Get_SA_associated_with_WO_Line_Item
recordLookups.label: Get SA associated with WO Line Item

recordLookups.description: Get the Service Appointment automatically generated by the work order so it can be deleted
recordLookups.name: Get_Serv_Appt_Auto_Gen_for_WO
recordLookups.label: Get Serv Appt Auto Gen for WO

recordLookups.description: Get Service Territories that have Work Type = Primary Work Type for the Template
recordLookups.name: Get_Service_Territories
recordLookups.label: Get Service Territories

recordLookups.description: Get Service Territory Address for Product Request later
recordLookups.name: Get_Service_Territory_Fields
recordLookups.label: Get Service Territory Fields

recordLookups.description: gets the id of the service appointment associated with the work order line item id --- this is the appointment used for secheduling
recordLookups.name: Get_ServiceAppointment
recordLookups.label: Get Service Appointment

recordLookups.description: Get all of the Work Order Line Items Created to drive loop to get the associated Service Appointments
recordLookups.name: Get_WO_Line_Items_Created
recordLookups.label: Get WO Line Items Created

recordLookups.name: Get_WO_Line_that_has_2nd_Work_Type
recordLookups.label: Get WO Line that has 2nd Work Type

recordLookups.description: Get the Work Order Template Dependencies for the work type of the current service appointment record.
recordLookups.name: Get_Work_Order_Template_Dependencies
recordLookups.label: Get Work Order Template Dependencies

fields.name: WorkOrderCreatedText
fields.fieldText:
All Done!


Have a great day!!

fields.name: GettingApptSlot_Text
fields.fieldText: Sending information to scheduler. Just one moment.....

fields.name: SelectClinic_Text
fields.fieldText: The clinics listed are accredited for the treatment. Select the clinic best for the patient.

fields.name: NeedProdShipment_Text
fields.fieldText:
Do you need to need a drug request/shipment for this appointment.


If yes, select from the list below.

fields.name: ServiceTerritoryAddress_Text
fields.fieldText: The product will be shipped to the clinic:

fields.name: SelectWOT_Text
fields.fieldText: Select the type of Appointment to Schedule

fields.name: AssocCase_Text
fields.fieldText:
Is this appointment associated with a Case?


﻿If yes select from below, otherwise leave blank/set to None

fields.name: Case_Picklist_S
fields.fieldText: Select Case to Associate to the Appointment

variables.description: Second Service Appointment Collection used for Dependency Flow
variables.name: var2ndSerAppt_Coll

variables.description: collection used for Create Appointment Dependencies
variables.name: varApptDependencyCollection

variables.description: ID of the service appointment with the work type that matches the (main) work type of the Work Order Template
variables.name: varMainServiceAppointment

variables.description: Collection of the newly created Service Appointments used later to to get dependencies
variables.name: varServiceAppointmentColl

variables.description: Count of the records in Service Appointment Collection --- used to drive the 2nd loop of Service Request within Dependency Loop
variables.name: varSR_Appt_Count

variables.description: index to force all values in Service Appt Collection are reviewed
variables.name: varSRLoopCount

variables.description: collection holding all of the new Work Order Lines created by the loop
variables.name: varWorkOrderLineColl
